title.narrative: Promoting Inclusion of Persons with Disability in Viet Nam

description.narrative: Project Goal is to contribute towards the inclusive society for people with disabilities in Viet Nam. The Project specific objectives are 1) to improve the inclusive environment for people with disabilities in Thai Nguyen province 2) to strengthen inclusiv e capacity of people with disabilities in Thai Nguyen province. Expected results of the Project are 1) Enforcement of the Disabilities Law in Thai Nguyen province improved 2) Expected result 2: Knowledge and understanding of local authorities in Thai Nguye n province on issues related to people with disabilities enhanced 3) Awareness of people in the targeted communes in Thai Nguyen province on inclusion of people with disabilities raised 4) Existing public facilities and constructions in the targeted commun es renovated to facilitate accessibility of people with disabilities to those public facilities and constructions 5) Current implementation of inclusion of people with disabilities and the inclusive capacity of people with disabilities in the targeted comm unes reviewed 6)Capacity on inclusion readiness of people with disabilities improved 7) DPOs and people with disabilities networking strengthened 8) Mobility of people with disabilities improved and 9) Self-finance activities for people with disabilities i mproved.???
